channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description:
No protest. Demand.
Get in the way.
No more normal.

@KathyZPrice Kathy, I don't think we're disagreeing at all. I'm just done with protesting. I know what we need to do. Add four liberal justices to the supreme court. I demand that. I'm not just protesting what the court has done. I want to act to prevent further damage.

I fully agree. Instead of protesting we should DEMAND that the Democrats expand the court. https://t.co/I8iSeNA5yJ
Draft for a petition. https://t.co/oSyWTAb2Vj
@ElieNYC Also if we must have a civil war now's the best time to have it for the same reason as C.
C is the correct answer. https://t.co/QpUejFdXee
"You have meddled with the primal forces of nature Mr Beale and I won't have it." https://t.co/9HbgIrWog4
@jeffjarvis This is who the oligarchs chose to lead us in a time of crisis.

@sirtwist I think 1 is the best. No tricks. Just add four liberal justices. The current court set that in motion, it's the obvious next step, they probably expect it. To Sanders, so what. More justices is good. And term limits, say 10 years.
Four ways to expand the US Supreme Court. https://t.co/BGdacMFQGU
@Peckiconis Awesome. You're going to love it. ;-)
This. This is a perfect analog for the software we develop. We strive to make it simple, but under the covers the simpler it is the harder it is to master. https://t.co/Nbd4ksBhSn
@truths_lib_bias yes she would have been fantastic. i find her inspiring. biden should at least say he's not running in 2024 so whitmer and others can declare.

We must narrow the focus of the Democratic Party to immediately adding four liberal justices to the Supreme Court, to flip the majority. Let's go march for this. A very focused goal. No more protests. We want something from the Democrats.
Time for the glue factory. https://t.co/Wf591y2SKu
Warren calls for Supreme Court expansion. ðŸ’¯ https://t.co/4aPTIN8FP7
Absolutely. This is the only retort possible. They must've known this is as far as they're going to get. If Biden won't nominate four new justices he must step aside. https://t.co/E2BYN9nHq7
@jeffjarvis @ThomasRTroland @simon_schama interesting confluence.

An old fashioned general strike may be needed, so that the Supreme Court can feel the power of the country they are fucking with. Shut it down for a day or two, and let them feel the power.
Treat the Supreme Court like Russia.

A dollar spent today tagging every single republican with the new abortion situation is worth $100 spent after november. they will find a way to wiggle out of this if they don't get tagged, hard, right now. Lets see if the Dems have any wartime leaders.
This is one Liz Cheney will not help with btw.
We're on our own with this. It'd be good for people to sort out the various crises we're dealing with.
Is Stacey Abrams a good wartime leader? Or does she have to stay focused on winning the Georgia governorship?
https://t.co/zeUI8fHeoU
I think Gretchen Whitmer would be a good wartime leader. Esp since the Repubs attacked women first.
@jayrosen_nyu i bet they figure out a way to blame it on muslims or the elite.
As usual the journalism focus is on the horse race. The people insist that the focus be on them.
@annamasera we'll try to hold the world together in the meantime. ;-)
Yesterday's podcast was pretty good imho. ;-) https://t.co/YQbVl7tHfH
